summary: Switches the default Stendarr's Aura visual effect with the Lightning Cloak, to make it less blinding during use.
descriptionHtml:
[b][[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/articles/51469]There will be no SE port of this mod. Read here for more information[/url]][/b]

Switches the default Stendarr's Aura visual effect with the Lightning Cloak, to make it less blinding during use. It's a nice spell to have, but it's even nicer to be able to see.
author: Rooker
